Initializer# init(_:in:)

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
init?<S>(
    _ range: NSRange,
    in string: S
) where S : StringProtocol
```

Available when `Bound` is `String.Index`.## [See Also](/documentation/Swift/Range/init(_:in:)-5qfor#see-also)

### [Converting Ranges](/documentation/Swift/Range/init(_:in:)-5qfor#Converting-Ranges)

[`func relative<C>(to: C) -> Range<Bound>`](/documentation/swift/range/relative(to:))Returns the range of indices described by this range expression within the given collection.[`init?(NSRange, in: String)`](/documentation/swift/range/init(_:in:)-5cclx)
